question.title: Fill PDF-form with individual data using java
question.body:
Use case:

Customer's data is collected at the point of sale. Further in the business process, this data needs to be checked and verified and may be augmented with additional data. Therefore, a PDF document with a fillable form is sent to the customer, the already collected data shall be pre-filled in the PDF form, so the customer can make corrections easily, if applicable. Other data will be provided by filling empty fields.

How to fill a form programmatically, using a commercial-friendly licensed Library/framework?
